newsitem.title: USA: Franklin Ophthalmic contracts to boost sales.
newsitem.headline: Franklin Ophthalmic contracts to boost sales.

text.p: Franklin Opthalmic Instruments Co Inc said Friday it was awarded significant sales contracts for equipment by Health Care and Retirement Corp of Ohio and the City of Chicago.
It also said it expanded its sales staff in the southeast and north central states.

President Michael Carroll said "The company anticipates that sales territory expansion is expected to result in an increase of annual sales revenue by as much as $3 million and is in accordance with the company's change of strategy from debt restructuring and sales maintenance to a strategy of aggressively pursuing expansion through new sales territories and opportunities."
The company sells instruments used by opthalmologists, optometrists and medical organizations.
